properties.displayName: _CSGP: AWS CloudTrail - Human users manually assuming the CSGPBuildAgentRole
properties.description:
Detects user principals manually assuming the CSGPBuildAgentRole after generating Vault OIDC temporary credentials. Should not fire as SecOps has already put controls in place for this. Would be a 'high' and needs to be investigated if this ever fires.

Handling Guidance: Investigate source IP address, user agent, and other details provided. Make sure to escalate to SecOps.
